PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-14212000-09-130,  ,  ,  ,  ND,  RESOURCES
PrecisEnactment of an ORDER EXCLUDING THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCE AND THE CANADIAN FORCES FROM THE APPLICATION OF THE NUCLEAR SAFETY AND CONTROL ACT AND ANY REGULATIONS MADE PURSUANT TO THIS ACT - which, while exempting DND and the Canadian Armed Forces from the Act and any Regulations made thereunder, oblige the Minister to establish and maintain rules and procedures for military operations that are consistent with the health, safety, security and environmental protection requirements of the Act.
Attachments
